commit message: Use the latest appcompat/support versions.
build.gradle: Update the gradle version.
build.gradle: Use the latest volley version.
Changes after re-import in Android Studio.

Use Snackbar instead of Toast.

This is the Material Design way.
Upgrade support library versions.
Use the latest (M, 23) Android SDK.

QuestionHelpFragment: Use non-deprecated API.

TextView.setTextAppearance() that takes a Context was deprecated
in SDK 23.

ItemFragment, ListFragment: Use non-deprecated onAttach().

It now takes a Context instead of an Activity, so we need to use
getActivity().
Turn off fullBackupContent.

FragmentClassify: Remove ScrollView ID.

android-line is complaining that this is a private resource, probably just
because of a conflict caused by the generic name. We don't use the ID
anyway.
Make a method static.
build.gradle: Use the Android M (23) SDK and build tools.
ClassifyActivity: Request any missing permissions.
LoginUtils, LoginActivity: Add comments about permission changes in SDK 23.

LoginUtils.GetExistingLogin async task: Store the exception.

And log it as a clue from the calling activity.

ClassifyActivity: Use the AppCompat checkSelfPermission().

And requestPermissions.
This avoids this runtime error on devices with SDK < 23:
' No virtual method checkSelfPermission '

QuestinFragment: Update another onAttach() method.

To take context, not activity.
Add @NonNull to overrides, matching base methods.
Removed and unused variable.
Remove unnecessary null assignment.

Regenerate ic_action_favorite.png icons.

This adds an xxx-hdpi version.
Using
http://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/icons-actionbar.html#source.type=clipart&source.space.trim=1&source.space.pad=0&source.clipart=res%2Fclipart%2Ficons%2Faction_favorite.svg&name=ic_action_favorite&theme=custom&color=000%2C100

The other files have also changed, but I think they are basically
the same. Maybe there is some antialiasing or compression change.

Regenerate ic_action_help.png icons.

This adds an xxx-hdpi version.
Using
http://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/icons-actionbar.html#source.type=clipart&source.space.trim=1&source.space.pad=0&source.clipart=res%2Fclipart%2Ficons%2Faction_favorite.svg&name=ic_action_favorite&theme=custom&color=000%2C100

The other files have also changed, but I think they are basically
the same. Maybe there is some antialiasing or compression change.

Regenerate ic_action_undo.png icons.

This adds an xxx-hdpi version.
Using
http://romannurik.github.io/AndroidAssetStudio/icons-actionbar.html#source.type=clipart&source.space.trim=1&source.space.pad=0&source.clipart=res%2Fclipart%2Ficons%2Fcontent_undo.svg&name=ic_action_undo&theme=custom&color=000%2C100

The other files have also changed, but I think they are basically
the same. Maybe there is some antialiasing or compression change.

ic_action_invert.png: Add an xxx-hdpi version (128x128 px).

By exporting
drawable-svg-originals/ic_action_ivert.svg
from Inkscape.
color.xml: Comment out an unused color.

Avoid a deprecation warning when using removeAccount().

We really need to use this on older SDK targets, and we already
if() for the version.
Add final keywords.
Singleton: Don't acess static member via instance.
Make some methods private.

AndroidManifest.xml: Limit some permissions to SDK <= 22.

Because the AccountManager API no longer needs these permissions
for what we do. See comments in the code when we use
checkPermissions().
Turn on some more inspections.
build.gradle: Update android library versions.

strings.xml: Use curly quotes.

Also removing the escaping, which is hopefully no longer necessary.
Use latests gradle android tool version
build.gradle: Update the volley and mockwebserver versions.

QuestionHelpFragment: Call the correct setTextAppearance() method depending on API target.

The new one is not available on older devices. The old one should not be called on
newer devices.
ZooniverseClientTest: Adapt to latest MockWebServer API.

Log: Check with isLoggable() before using Log.i().

As suggested by android-lint.

Classified subject viewer: Make the ID selectable.

Because this could conceivably be useful and people won't use this
much. Make the other TextViews in the rest of the UI non-selectable,
because it would probably just confuse regular interaction.
This stops android-lint from suggesting this.
Remove an unused ID

ItemsContentProvider: onUpgrade: Correct the break position.

To avoid a fall-through to default. Found by android-lint.

Remove unused layout IDs and document where they are really not unused.

Noticed by android-lint.

activity_list.html: Set tools:layout

The Design view for the layout suggested this.

LoginUtils: Add missing initialization for mException.

Found by Android Studio's Inspection.

Settings: Add '200' as a number of items to download in advance.

Because hiigaran asked for it:
http://talk.galaxyzoo.org/#/boards/BGZ0000003/discussions/DGZ0001dry

Add the new decals decision tree for the new decals subject groups.

Generated locally from my http://localhost:9294/#/murrayctest page
when running my hacky fork of GalaxyZoo:
https://github.com/murraycu/Galaxy-Zoo/commits/master
Config: Use the decals tree.

Add decals example images.

Adding an icon_ prefix and removing the .jpg suffix,
because that's what the app expects.

Resize the decals icons to be 100x100 like the others.

Using this imagemagick command in a terminal:
mogrify -resize 100x100 icon_decals-*

Unlike the sloan and candels icons, the decals icons are just
the full example image. But we want only thumbnails to be packaged
with the app.
decals: Add the latest (jpg) versions of the example images.

Resize the decals icons to be 100x100 like the others.

Using this imagemagick command in a terminal:
mogrify -resize 100x100 icon_decals-*

Unlike the sloan and candels icons, the decals icons are just
the full example image. But we want only thumbnails to be packaged
with the app.

Add the illustris tree.

I am not able to generate this yet:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/issues/214#issuecomment-138265796
but apparently it has the same tree as sloan:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/commit/ca54d8c7cf97a19b3d2f99d8beb1c91687153a48
so I just copied sloan_tree.xml and changed
the IDs.

Add the illustris example images.

By copying them from here:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/tree/decals_illustris/public/images/examples
, removing the .jpg suffix, and adding the icon_ prefix.

Resize the illustris icons to be 100x100 like the others.

Using this imagemagick command in a terminal:
mogrify -resize 100x100 icon_decals-*

Unlike the sloan and candels icons, the illustris icons are just
the full example image. But we want only thumbnails to be packaged
with the app.
Config: Add the Illustris survey.

illustris_tree.xml: Update the examples counts based on the real tree.

Changed manually by looking at the actual tree here:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/blob/decals_illustris/app/lib/illustris_tree.coffee#L40
because I cannot yet generate it:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/issues/214#issuecomment-138265796
I noticed that some of the text needed to be changed too - this tree is
in fact not exactl the same as the sloan tree.

illustris: Swap questions 5 and 6.

As in illustris.coffee in GalaxyZoo.
See my previous commit:
https://github.com/murraycu/android-galaxyzoo/commit/955d806ebddaee0016937a4d9ff1821be7d98ef4

illustris: Correct the illustris-5 filenames from -a to -x.

This is already correct in the Galaxy-Zoo decals_illustris branch:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/tree/decals_illustris/public/images/examples
illustris: Correct the examples counts.

decals: Correct the icon-decals-10 image filenames.
See https://github.com/murraycu/Galaxy-Zoo/commit/aede3e939da9afa89bef08854522b40e6d973c45
in the Galaxy Zoo web UI.

decals: Add overlapping icon.

From here:
https://github.com/zooniverse/Galaxy-Zoo/blob/decals_illustris/public/images/overlapping.png

Illustris: Generate the tree from my tree_xml_export branch.

Now that the text is in en.coffee in Galaxy Zoo so that the exporter works.

decals and illustris: Re-copy the example files from Galaxy Zoo.

Because there are some new ones and I'm not sure if they have
changed.

Resize the decals and illustris icons to be 100x100 like the others.

Using this imagemagick command in a terminal:
mogrify -resize 100x100 icon_decals-*

Unlike the sloan and candels icons, these icons are just
the full example image. But we want only thumbnails to be packaged
with the app.
Decals: Re-generate the tree from my tree_xml_export branch.
decals/illustris: Update ZooniverseClientTest
Update translations.

proguard-rules: Add dontwarn lines to fix apk build

As suggested here:
http://stackoverflow.com/a/32258417/1123654
mapping
